author: musa133796
content: Hello, I’m currently researching bloXroute’s Blockchain Distribution Network (BDN) (Gateway, relaying...etc.) and its impact on Ethereum’s Validator performance. I’m particularly interested in understanding how it has affected transaction and block propagation speeds, as well as the overall performance of the validator. If anyone has used the bloXroute gateway or has insights into its performance, could you please share your experiences? Thank you!
